colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BLO GROS KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS GRONG CHOG PA RNAMS KYI THUGS BZHED BSKONG BA'I SLAD DU BRI DGOS SU BSKUL BAR BRTEN, SNYIGS DUS KYI @024B MTHA' LA SLEBS PAS RGYAL PO'I GNOD PA BOD PA'I DUS 'DIR 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN PA'ANG SRID DAM SNYAM PAS RGYAL PO'I MDOS GZHUNG SOGS KHUNGS THUB RNAMS KYI DON DANG MI 'GAL BAR BSGRIGS PA PO NI DHARMA SVA MI WAGINDRA PA tU SIDDHI'I MING CAN NO, ,@025A *, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA RNAMS NGA RGYAL DANG ZHO SNGANG GIS BSKUL BA'I GNOD BYED KYI 'CHAR SGO SNA TSOGS LAM THAR BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: DHARMA SVA MI WAGINDRA PA tU SIDDHI'I MING CAN,
